import React from 'react' import classes from './Conditions.module.css' const Conditions = (props) => { return (
{props.responseObj.cod === 200 ?

{props.responseObj.name}, {props.responseObj.sys.country}

{props.responseObj.weather[0].main}

{Math.round(props.responseObj.main.temp)}°C

Min: {Math.round(props.responseObj.main.temp_min)}°C

Max: {Math.round(props.responseObj.main.temp_max)}°C

: null }
) } export default Conditions
